categories: Category:Military personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Major Cassare was a Human female who served as Imperial soldier under the reconstituted Sith Empire. She was present in the Imperial Command Center on Ossus during the Empire's invasion of the planet.
Major Cassare serves as a reputation-vendor on the Imperial Side at Ossus within the game Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne.
